test_module.name: sprint/test_us54056_controller_compute_services/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) PROMPTTIMEOUT 10 SEC
SET CR } SET CL {
CALL ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/controller_compute_services.elt HOST_IP=$env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat HOST_USER=$env.NODE.target.Connect.ssh_user HOST_PASS=$env.NODE.target.Connect.ssh_pass
PASS
